overview: This is a film, but also a journey. In the indifferent poetic journey of director Tai Ting, I meet people who are struggling to find their own lives and find close to the land. Everyone has a starting point, a curve of travel, and a waiting answer. What are they looking for? What kind of invisible expectations are revealed by those tangible searches? The director is moving in the quiet and beautiful space, whispering, the people staring into the distance.
title: Almost In Life
